song_lyrics: Saunu karo kalyāṇ ho, dayāḷu Prabhu ho;
Māṇas pashu pankhīnī sāthe, jīva jantūnu tamām...
Jagnā vāsī sau sukh bhogve, ānand āṭho jām;
Duniyāmā dushkāḷ paḍe nahi, laḍe nahi koī gām... saunu 1
Pot potānā dharma pramāṇe, sau bhaje Bhagwān... saunu 2
Sarve jage sukhkārī vadhe ne, vaḷī vadhe dhan dhān;
Koī koīnu būru na īchchhe, īchchhe saūnu samān... saunu 3
title: Saunu karo kalyāṇ ho dayāḷu Prabhu ho

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-242: unknown

Category: Bal Kirtan
